exclusion.criterion: Previous history of coronary artery disease (ischemic heart disease such as angina, heart attack, myocardial infarction).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Failure of Modified Allen's Test in both hands.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Currently taking medications or herbal supplements for any heart or respiratory disease that they cannot stop taking for 48hrs prior to testing (seasonal allergy Lidocaine, nitroglycerine or heparin allergy).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or trying to become pregnant.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of any condition that would prevent the subject from performing cycle ergometer exercise (for exercise study only).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: PFO/ASD deemed by referring physician as not fully closed/endothelialized at 6 months post-PFO/ASD closure procedure.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
